Je hebt deze e-mail ontvangen omdat jij:
You have received this email, because somebody has requested a password reset for your account. 

Click the following link or paste it in into the address bar of your browser to complete the process: %s://%s/reset/%s

If you didn't request this password reset, please ignore this email and your user credentials will remain unchanged.
Een e-mail is gestuurd naar %s met verde: An email has been sent to %s containing further instructions to reset your password
Hallo,\n\n Dit is een bevestiging dat he:
Hello,

 This is a confirmation to tell you that the password for %s has been changed.
